trans-unit.source: Provides a visual editor for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager" /> fields.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager" /> 字段的可视化编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor> class provides a visual editor that is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor>类提供内部使用的可视编辑器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Context information about the design environment.
trans-unit.target: 有关设计环境的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the associated designer.

Displays the visual editor by using the style that is indicated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> method to update the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用由 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> 方法指示的样式来显示可视化编辑器，以更新 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
Context information about the design environment.
trans-unit.target: 有关设计环境的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: 获取编辑器将使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一，它指示编辑器将使用的样式的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the editor style that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method and will always return `UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示使用的编辑器样式<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法并将始终返回`UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`。
